ObjectClass.Name: Teleporter
ObjectClass.Description:
TELEPORTER:
Teleports units to any location within a medium distance

Objective.Name: Idle
Objective.Details: Teleporter Gate\Regular operation mode\ \Help units teleport to destination

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Tether
Objective.Details: Long range teleport receiver \for Teleporters, Slipgates, and Spyres \ \Can move itself

Objective.Name: Chronoporter
Objective.Details: Medium building\Transports units through time\Creates TSS (Temporal Soliton Shield)

Objective.Name: Upgrade Gate Tech
Objective.Details: \Enables building Chronoporters and Tethers \ \Enables Human units to Chronoport

ObjectClass.Name: Gate-Tech Center
ObjectClass.Description:
Gate-Tech:
This Teleporter is now a dedicated Tech support building
Visible to all factions through Fog of War

ObjectClass.Name: Teleporter (Wreckage)
ObjectClass.Description:
This Teleporter is destroyed
No risk from further internal explosions
